channel.title: Among the Sleep - Play as a 2 year old child.
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YWDQN_X5b-M[/url]
Looks like Amnesia meets the playable baby part in Fallout 3 and it looks awesome.

item.title: Among the Sleep - Play as a 2 year old child.
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
If there’s one thing Dear Esther taught me, it’s that I don’t give a fuck about interaction if I’m placed in a world that plays ME. This looks like that kind of world.

item.title: Among the Sleep - Play as a 2 year old child.
item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
How will the gameplay be? Crawl & hide? I’m not sure of the combat capabilities of a 2 year old, not to mention puzzle solving (other than putting a square box to a square hole)

The concept is still great, i remember fearing toys moving by themselves and bogeyman shit

Read full topic
item.source: Among the Sleep - Play as a 2 year old child.

item.title: Among the Sleep - Play as a 2 year old child.
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Fnork:

I paid a visit to their website, and what I got from that was that you’ll move through surreal fantasy locations, conjured up by a child’s imagination.

…Darn!

Narnia sounds less interesting than a young child traumatized by nightmares every time they fall asleep.

Read full topic

item.source: Among the Sleep - Play as a 2 year old child.

item.title: Among the Sleep - Play as a 2 year old child.
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

Or maybe chapters could have the player abandoned in other settings, like a daycare center… playground… movie theater… grocery store… shopping mall… older-sibling’s school… amusement park… airport… or parking garage… assuming from the title that the player character enters these horror modes by sleeping wherever they happen to be. And at that age, “wherever they happen to be” means “wherever their parents took them”.

That would make sense and be an awesome concept. I hope you’re right.

Read full topic
item.source: Among the Sleep - Play as a 2 year old child.

item.title: Among the Sleep - Play as a 2 year old child.
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
I can only predict that players get ranked by how traumatized their player character grows up to be. Prioritize between receiving a lack of stimulation and sustaining utter paranoia.

I hope the levels are bigger than a single four-bedroom home. Like, a sprawling forested backyard, or a full suburban neighborhood, or a basement that leads to an abandoned bomb-shelter network.

Or maybe chapters could have the player abandoned in other settings, like a daycare center… playground… movie theater… grocery store… shopping mall… older-sibling’s school… amusement park… airport… or parking garage… assuming from the title that the player character enters these horror modes by sleeping wherever they happen to be. And at that age, “wherever they happen to be” means “wherever their parents took them”.

Read full topic
